name: Bat Encounter Timing
description: Testing bat NPC appearance and carrying behavior timing

entries.expectedOutput:
Bat Room
You are in a small room which has doors only to the east and south.

Time passes...
A large vampire bat (a reject from WUMPUS) swoops down from his belfry and lifts you away....

Mine Entrance
You are standing at the entrance of what might have been a coal mine. The shaft enters the west wall, and there is another exit on the south end of the room.
entries.notes: Bat has carried player to new location
